summary: The diff implements all 6 requirements (REQ-14 through REQ-19) for fixing product display issues and enhancing the home page with luxury design. All acceptance criteria are addressed including: comprehensive error handling with skeleton loaders and user-friendly error messages across all product pages; luxury hero section with Playfair Display typography, premium background imagery, and elegant animations; enhanced product cards with gold accents, elevated shadows, and hover transformations; sophisticated categories section with luxury grid layout and premium imagery; refined testimonials section with elegant card designs and gold-styled quotation marks; and polished overall layout with elegant dividers, consistent beige/white/gold color palette, and refined micro-interactions throughout.
